text: I have written a Ruby gem named 'this'.
Purpose of 'this' is to show quotes of 'The Zen of Ruby' whenever you "require 'this'".
As I could not find any equivalent zen quotes for Ruby, currently I am using 'The Zen of Python' (PEP 20).
Can you guys suggest me good quotes that Ruby 'Zen' should have.
I would update 'this' gem to have new quotes.
